name: Krazy Kitten Kayaking
description:
It's a game about kayaking in wild currents.

Also you are a kitten that is afraid of fish, sharp rocks and drowning.

Game created in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2017 using the **Koding Nights 2D Game Engine** based on the amazing LibGDX Java framework and Liquidfun from Google.

Twitter: @kodingnights https://twitter.com/kodingnights Web: http://kodingnights.com/ Youtube/Plus: https://www.youtube.com/c/KodingNightsIndie
